name: Scrollonoid
description: Scrollonid it's a 2D symbiosis of arkanoid and scroll shooter game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP SP2+ (64-bit) Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: onboard
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: onboard
